meanings.definition: Forces that act in opposition to another force.
meanings.sent1: The counterforces of the magnets pushed against each other.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's strength was met with counterforces from the villain.
meanings.sent3: The counterforces of the wind made the kite fly in circles.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of good versus evil, the counterforces clashed fiercely.
meanings.sent5: The counterforces of nature can be seen in the ebb and flow of the tides.

meanings.definition: Things that oppose or work against something else.
meanings.sent1: The counterforces of the protesters were met with resistance.
meanings.sent2: The counterforces of supply and demand determine prices.
meanings.sent3: The counterforces of procrastination and motivation battled in his mind.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the counterforces that propelled her forward.
meanings.sent5: The counterforces of tradition clashed with the winds of change.
